item.title: Common HttpClient tasks you're googling or asking ChatGPT
item.description: Using HttpClient has become my default choice when making HTTP requests from .NET. While there are many good alternatives out there (like Refit, Flurl, and RestSharp), having a built-in client that does most tasks in a pretty easy and straightforward way, makes this an obvious choice for many.
